name: Papra
description: Papra is a document management and organization system that provides a streamlined way to manage, organize, and access your documents. It offers features for document ingestion, tagging, search, and secure storage.

notes.text: Configuration file: /opt/papra/.env - Edit this file to customize Papra settings.
After editing the configuration file, restart the service with: systemctl restart papra
Persistent data is stored in /opt/papra/app-data. Make sure to backup this directory regularly.
